SSBSE 2010

2nd International Symposium on Search Based Software Engineering

Benevento, Italy

Tuesday 7th September 2010 - Thursday 9th September 2010

ABOUT BENEVENTO:

The venue for SSBSE 2010 is the beautiful and historic town of Benevento, Italy. Benevento is located in southern Italy, 230 km south-east of Rome, and 80 km north-east of Naples.

For a map of the conference and various landmarks around it, please see the bottom of this page!

HOW TO REACH BENEVENTO:

Benevento is easily reached by train from either Naples Capodichino (NAP) airport (about 1 hour 40 minutes) or Rome Fiumicino (FCO) / Rome Ciampino (CIA) airports (about 2 hours). Please see the Trenitalia website for details.

CONFERENCE LOCATION:

The conference will be held at the Faculty of Economic Sciences (S.E.A.) Via delle Puglie, 82 (5 min. walking distance from the city centre) in the room "Aula Magna" (Ground -2).

CONFERENCE WELCOME COCKTAIL

The conference welcome cocktail will be held on September 7, 6.00pm in the garden of "Rocca dei Rettori"

CONFERENCE DINNER

The conference social dinner will be held on September 8, 2010, 8.00 pm. at the restaurant "Gino e Pina" - Via Giuseppe Cassella, 48 http://www.ginoepina.it/locale.htm (only in Italian)

HOTEL INFORMATION:

The conference venue is located in the heart of downtown, at a walking distance from many hotels.

Some possible suggested hotels are:

Hotel Villa Traiano (****), 7 min. walking distance from the conference location. (http://www.hotelvillatraiano.it/)

Hotel President (****), 3 min. walking distance from the conference location. (http://www.hotelpresidentbenevento.it/)

Grand Hotel Italiano (****), 15 min. walking distance from the conference location. (http://www.hotel-italiano.it/)

Information about special rates with some hotels will be added soon.
